sense.def:
A reward
je nekaj, kar nam nekdo da, ker smo naredili nekaj koristnega ali dobrega.

seg.quote: They work with no thought of reward.

sense.def:
To reward someone
pomeni nekomu dati nekaj, ker je naredil nekaj koristnega ali dobrega.

seg.quote: People should be rewarded for special effort.
They rewarded the winners with gifts of fruit and flowers.
